sqlMap.insert:

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.updateCntrwkDtl */ /* 공사상세정보 수정 */ UPDATE TN_CNTRWK_DTL SET
CNTRWK_ID = #CNTRWK_ID# /* 공사상세정보.공사_ID */
, RPAIR_MTHD_CODE = #RPAIR_MTHD_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.보수_공법_코드 */
, DETAIL_CNTRWK_GROUP = #DETAIL_CNTRWK_GROUP# /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_그룹 */
, DETAIL_CNTRWK_NM = #DETAIL_CNTRWK_NM# /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_명 */
, TRACK_LEN = #TRACK_LEN#::int /* 공사상세정보.1차로_연장 */
, SPRVISN_CO_NO = #SPRVISN_CO_NO#::int /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_번호 */
, SPRVISN_CO_NM = #SPRVISN_CO_NM# /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_명 */
, SPRVISN_CO_RPRSNT_NO = #SPRVISN_CO_RPRSNT_NO# /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_대표_번호 */
, SPRVISN_CO_RPRSNTV_NM = #SPRVISN_CO_RPRSNTV_NM# /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_대표자_명 */
, SPRVISOR_NM = #SPRVISOR_NM# /* 공사상세정보.감리원_명 */
, SPRVISOR_TELNO = #SPRVISOR_TELNO# /* 공사상세정보.감리원_전화번호 */
, CNSTRCT_CO_NO = #CNSTRCT_CO_NO#::int /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_번호 */
, CNSTRCT_CO_NM = #CNSTRCT_CO_NM# /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_명 */
, CNSTRCT_CO_RPRSNTV_NM = #CNSTRCT_CO_RPRSNTV_NM# /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_대표자_명 */
, CNSTRCT_CO_TELNO = #CNSTRCT_CO_TELNO# /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_전화번호 */
, CNSTRCT_CO_CHARGER_NM = #CNSTRCT_CO_CHARGER_NM# /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_담당자_명 */
, SPT_HDCH_NM = #SPT_HDCH_NM# /* 공사상세정보.현장_소장_명 */
, SPT_HDCH_TELNO = #SPT_HDCH_TELNO# /* 공사상세정보.현장_소장_전화번호 */
, ROAD_NM = #ROAD_NM# /* 공사상세정보.도로_명 */
, ROUTE_CODE = #ROUTE_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.노선_코드 */
, DIRECT_CODE = #DIRECT_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.행선_코드 */
, TRACK = #TRACK# /* 공사상세정보.차로 */
, STRTPT = #STRTPT#::int /* 공사상세정보.시점 */
, ENDPT = #ENDPT#::int /* 공사상세정보.종점 */
, CNTRWK_STRTPT_NM = #CNTRWK_STRTPT_NM# /* 공사상세정보.공사_시점_명 */
, CNTRWK_ENDPT_NM = #CNTRWK_ENDPT_NM# /* 공사상세정보.공사_종점_명 */
, CNTRWK_AMOUNT = #CNTRWK_AMOUNT#::int /* 공사상세정보.공사_금액 */
, GVSLCT = #GVSLCT#::int /* 공사상세정보.관급비 */
, OUTSRCCT = #OUTSRCCT#::int /* 공사상세정보.도급비 */
, ETC_RLOCATCT = #ETC_RLOCATCT#::int /* 공사상세정보.기타_이설비 */
, CNTRWK_TMPRT = #CNTRWK_TMPRT# /* 공사상세정보.공사_기온 */
, CNTRWK_WETHR = #CNTRWK_WETHR# /* 공사상세정보.공사_날씨 */
, CNTRWK_TIME = #CNTRWK_TIME# /* 공사상세정보.공사_시간 */
, CNTRWK_CL = #CNTRWK_CL# /* 공사상세정보.공사_분류 */
, BUS_DVR_TRACK_AT = #BUS_DVR_TRACK_AT# /* 공사상세정보.버스_전용_차로_여부 */
, BEFORE_PAV_YEAR = #BEFORE_PAV_YEAR# /* 공사상세정보.직전_포장_연도 */
, RPAIR_BEGIN_DE = #RPAIR_BEGIN_DE# /* 공사상세정보.보수_시작_일자 */
, RPAIR_END_DE = #RPAIR_END_DE# /* 공사상세정보.보수_종료_일자 */
, RPAIR_AR = #RPAIR_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.보수_면적 */
, RPAIR_BT = #RPAIR_BT#::int /* 공사상세정보.보수_폭 */
, PAV_STLE_CODE = #PAV_STLE_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.포장_형태_코드 */
, PAV_MSRC_ETC = #PAV_MSRC_ETC# /* 공사상세정보.포장_공법_기타 */
, RPAIR_THICK_DC = #RPAIR_THICK_DC# /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_설명 */
, RPAIR_THICK = #RPAIR_THICK#::int /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께 */
, RPAIR_THICK_BASE = #RPAIR_THICK_BASE#::int /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_기층 */
, RPAIR_THICK_CNTR = #RPAIR_THICK_CNTR#::int /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_중간층 */
, RPAIR_THICK_ASCON = #RPAIR_THICK_ASCON#::int /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_표층 */
, PAV_MATRL_ASCON_ETC = #PAV_MATRL_ASCON_ETC# /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_표층_기타 */
, PAV_MATRL_BASE_CODE = #PAV_MATRL_BASE_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_기층_코드 */
, PAV_MATRL_BASE_ETC = #PAV_MATRL_BASE_ETC# /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_기층_기타 */
, PAV_MATRL_CNTR_CODE = #PAV_MATRL_CNTR_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_중간층_코드 */
, PAV_MATRL_CNTR_ETC = #PAV_MATRL_CNTR_ETC# /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_중간층_기타 */
, RPAIR_MATRL_DETAIL_NM = #RPAIR_MATRL_DETAIL_NM# /* 공사상세정보.보수_재료_세부_명 */
, RPAIR_MATRL_PRDCT_CO_NM = #RPAIR_MATRL_PRDCT_CO_NM# /* 공사상세정보.보수_재료_생산_업체_명 */
, PRDCT_CO_TELNO = #PRDCT_CO_TELNO# /* 공사상세정보.생산_업체_전화번호 */
, ASPAT_RNS_CRRSPND_AT = #ASPAT_RNS_CRRSPND_AT# /* 공사상세정보.아스팔트_실명제_해당_여부 */
, RM = #RM# /* 공사상세정보.비고 */
, PROCESS_RESULT_MSSAGE = #PROCESS_RESULT_MSSAGE# /* 공사상세정보.처리_결과_메세지 */
, OPERT_BFE_PHOTO_NO = #OPERT_BFE_PHOTO_NO#::int /* 공사상세정보.작업_전_사진_번호 */
, OPERT_AFT_PHOTO_NO = #OPERT_AFT_PHOTO_NO#::int /* 공사상세정보.작업_후_사진_번호 */
, FILE_NO = #FILE_NO#::int /* 공사상세정보.파일_번호 */
, CONFM_STTUS_CODE = #CONFM_STTUS_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.승인_상태_코드 */
, CONFM_DT = #CONFM_DT# /* 공사상세정보.승인_일시 */
, CONFMER_NO = #CONFMER_NO#::int /* 공사상세정보.승인자_번호 */
, EXTRL_REGIST_AT = #EXTRL_REGIST_AT# /* 공사상세정보.외부_등록_여부 */
, UPDUSR_NO = #UPDUSR_NO#::int /* 공사상세정보.수정자_번호 */
, UPDT_DT = NOW() /* 공사상세정보.수정_일시 */
, PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE = #PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE# /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_표층_코드 */
, PAINT_MSRC = #PAINT_MSRC# /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_공법 */
, PAINT_YLWSLLN_AR = #PAINT_YLWSLLN_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_황색실선_면적 */
, PAINT_YLWDASHLN_AR = #PAINT_YLWDASHLN_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_황색파선_면적 */
, PAINT_WHSLLN_AR = #PAINT_WHSLLN_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_백색실선_면적 */
, PAINT_CRSLK_CO = #PAINT_CRSLK_CO#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_횡단보도_개수 */
, PAINT_STOPLN_CO = #PAINT_STOPLN_CO#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_정지선_개수 */
, PAINT_STOPLN_AR = #PAINT_STOPLN_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_정지선_면적 */
, PAINT_SPDBMP_CO = #PAINT_SPDBMP_CO#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_방지턱_개수 */
, PAINT_SPDBMP_AR = #PAINT_SPDBMP_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_방지턱_면적 */
, PAINT_WHDASHLN_AR = #PAINT_WHDASHLN_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_백색파선_면적 */
, PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_CO = #PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_CO#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_문자기호_개수 */
, PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_AR = #PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_문자기호_면적 */
, PAINT_CRSLK_AR = #PAINT_CRSLK_AR#::int /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_횡단보도_면적 */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID = #DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID# /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_ID */
sqlMap.delete: /* cntrwkDtlDAO.deleteCntrwkDtl */ /* 공사상세정보 삭제 */ UPDATE TN_CNTRWK_DTL SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , USE_AT = 'N' , UPDUSR_NO = #UPDUSR_NO#::int , UPDT_DT = NOW() WHERE 1 = 1 AND DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID = #DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID# /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_ID */

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.deleteCntrwkDtlByCntrwkId */ /* 공사상세정보 삭제 */ UPDATE TN_CNTRWK_DTL SET DELETE_AT = 'Y' , USE_AT = 'N' , UPDUSR_NO = #UPDUSR_NO#::int , UPDT_DT = NOW() WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTRWK_ID = #CNTRWK_ID# /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_ID */
sqlMap.select: /* cntrwkDtlDAO.selectCntrwkDtl */ /* 공사상세정보 조회 */ SELECT tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_ID */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ID /* 공사상세정보.공사_ID */ , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE /* 공사상세정보.보수_공법_코드 */ , (SELECT tccode.CODE_NM FROM TC_RPAIR_MTHD tcrpairmthd LEFT OUTER JOIN TC_CODE tccode ON tccode.CODE_VAL = tcrpairmthd.MSRC_CL_CODE AND tccode.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tccode.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE tcrpairmthd.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE = tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE AND tcrpairmthd.DELETE_AT = 'N') AS RPAIR_MTHD_NM /* 공사상세정보.보수_공법명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_GROUP /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_그룹 */ , tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_NM /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_명 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.TRACK_LEN,0) AS TRACK_LEN /* 공사상세정보.1차로_연장 */ , tncntrwkdtl.SPRVISN_CO_NO /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_번호 */ , COALESCE((SELECT CO_NM FROM TN_COMPANY tncompany WHERE tncompany.CO_NO = tncntrwkdtl.SPRVISN_CO_NO), tncntrwkdtl.SPRVISN_CO_NM) AS SPRVISN_CO_NM /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.SPRVISN_CO_RPRSNT_NO /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_대표_번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.SPRVISN_CO_RPRSNTV_NM /* 공사상세정보.감리_업체_대표자_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.SPRVISOR_NM /* 공사상세정보.감리원_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.SPRVISOR_TELNO /* 공사상세정보.감리원_전화번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNSTRCT_CO_NO /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_번호 */ , COALESCE((SELECT CO_NM FROM TN_COMPANY tncompany WHERE tncompany.CO_NO = tncntrwkdtl.CNSTRCT_CO_NO), tncntrwkdtl.CNSTRCT_CO_NM) AS CNSTRCT_CO_NM /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNSTRCT_CO_RPRSNTV_NM /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_대표자_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNSTRCT_CO_TELNO /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_전화번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNSTRCT_CO_CHARGER_NM /* 공사상세정보.시공_업체_담당자_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.SPT_HDCH_NM /* 공사상세정보.현장_소장_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.SPT_HDCH_TELNO /* 공사상세정보.현장_소장_전화번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.ROAD_NM /* 공사상세정보.도로_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE /* 공사상세정보.노선_코드 */ , (SELECT ROAD_NAME FROM TN_ROUTE_INFO WHERE ROAD_NO = tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE ) ROUTE_NM/* 공사상세정보.노선_코드 */ , tncntrwkdtl.DIRECT_CODE /* 공사상세정보.행선_코드 */ , tncntrwkdtl.TRACK /* 공사상세정보.차로 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.STRTPT,0) AS STRTPT /* 공사상세정보.시점 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.ENDPT,0) AS ENDPT/* 공사상세정보.종점 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_STRTPT_NM /* 공사상세정보.공사_시점_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ENDPT_NM /* 공사상세정보.공사_종점_명 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_AMOUNT,0) AS CNTRWK_AMOUNT /* 공사상세정보.공사_금액 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.GVSLCT,0) AS GVSLCT /* 공사상세정보.관급비 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.OUTSRCCT,0) AS OUTSRCCT /* 공사상세정보.도급비 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.ETC_RLOCATCT,0) AS ETC_RLOCATCT /* 공사상세정보.기타_이설비 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_TMPRT /* 공사상세정보.공사_기온 */ , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM TC_CODE tccode WHERE tccode.CODE_VAL=tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_WETHR) AS CNTRWK_WETHR /* 공사상세정보.공사_날씨 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_TIME /* 공사상세정보.공사_시간 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_CL /* 공사상세정보.공사_분류 */ , tncntrwkdtl.BUS_DVR_TRACK_AT /* 공사상세정보.버스_전용_차로_여부 */ , tncntrwkdtl.BEFORE_PAV_YEAR /* 공사상세정보.직전_포장_연도 */ , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_BEGIN_DE /* 공사상세정보.보수_시작_일자 */ , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_END_DE /* 공사상세정보.보수_종료_일자 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_AR,0) AS RPAIR_AR /* 공사상세정보.보수_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_BT,0) AS RPAIR_BT /* 공사상세정보.보수_폭 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_STLE_CODE /* 공사상세정보.포장_형태_코드 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MSRC_ETC /* 공사상세정보.포장_공법_기타 */ , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_THICK_DC /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_설명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_THICK /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_THICK_BASE,0) AS RPAIR_THICK_BASE /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_기층 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_THICK_CNTR,0) AS RPAIR_THICK_CNTR /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_중간층 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_THICK_ASCON,0) AS RPAIR_THICK_ASCON /* 공사상세정보.보수_두께_표층 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_ETC/* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_표층_기타 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_BASE_CODE/* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_기층_코드 */ , (SELECT PAV_MATRL_NM FROM TC_PAV_MATRL tcpavmatrl WHERE tcpavmatrl.PAV_MATRL_CODE = tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_BASE_CODE) AS PAV_MATRL_BASE_NM /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_기층명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_BASE_ETC /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_기층_기타 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_CNTR_CODE/* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_중간층_코드 */ , (SELECT PAV_MATRL_NM FROM TC_PAV_MATRL tcpavmatrl WHERE tcpavmatrl.PAV_MATRL_CODE = tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_CNTR_CODE) AS PAV_MATRL_CNTR_NM /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_중간층명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_CNTR_ETC /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_중간층_기타 */ , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MATRL_DETAIL_NM /* 공사상세정보.보수_재료_세부_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MATRL_PRDCT_CO_NM /* 공사상세정보.보수_재료_생산_업체_명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PRDCT_CO_TELNO /* 공사상세정보.생산_업체_전화번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.ASPAT_RNS_CRRSPND_AT /* 공사상세정보.아스팔트_실명제_해당_여부 */ , tncntrwkdtl.RM /* 공사상세정보.비고 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PROCESS_RESULT_MSSAGE /* 공사상세정보.처리_결과_메세지 */ , tncntrwkdtl.OPERT_BFE_PHOTO_NO /* 공사상세정보.작업_전_사진_번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.OPERT_AFT_PHOTO_NO /* 공사상세정보.작업_후_사진_번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.FILE_NO /* 공사상세정보.파일_번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CONFM_STTUS_CODE /* 공사상세정보.승인_상태_코드 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CONFM_DT /* 공사상세정보.승인_일시 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CONFMER_NO /* 공사상세정보.승인자_번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.EXTRL_REGIST_AT /* 공사상세정보.외부_등록_여부 */ , tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT /* 공사상세정보.사용_여부 */ , tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT /* 공사상세정보.삭제_여부 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CRTR_NO /* 공사상세정보.생성자_번호 */ , tncntrwkdtl.CREAT_DT /* 공사상세정보.생성_일시 */ , tncntrwkdtl.UPDUSR_NO /* 공사상세정보.수정자_번호 */ , (SELECT USER_ID FROM TN_SYS_USER tnsysuser WHERE tnsysuser.USER_NO = tncntrwkdtl.UPDUSR_NO) AS UPDUSR_ID , tncntrwkdtl.UPDT_DT /* 공사상세정보.수정_일시 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_표층_코드 */ , (SELECT PAV_MATRL_NM FROM TC_PAV_MATRL tcpavmatrl WHERE tcpavmatrl.PAV_MATRL_CODE = tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE ) AS PAV_MATRL_ASCON_NM /* 공사상세정보.포장_재료_표층명 */ , tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_MSRC /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_공법 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_YLWSLLN_AR,0) AS PAINT_YLWSLLN_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_황색실선_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_YLWDASHLN_AR,0) AS PAINT_YLWDASHLN_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_황색파선_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_WHSLLN_AR,0) AS PAINT_WHSLLN_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_백색실선_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_CRSLK_CO,0) AS PAINT_CRSLK_CO /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_횡단보도_개수 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_STOPLN_CO,0) AS PAINT_STOPLN_CO /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_정지선_개수 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_STOPLN_AR,0) AS PAINT_STOPLN_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_정지선_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_SPDBMP_CO,0) AS PAINT_SPDBMP_CO /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_방지턱_개수 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_SPDBMP_AR,0) AS PAINT_SPDBMP_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_방지턱_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_WHDASHLN_AR,0) AS PAINT_WHDASHLN_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_백색파선_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_CO,0) AS PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_CO /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_문자기호_개수 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_AR,0) AS PAINT_CHRCTRSYMBL_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_문자기호_면적 */ , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.PAINT_CRSLK_AR,0) AS PAINT_CRSLK_AR /* 공사상세정보.차선_도색_횡단보도_면적 */ FROM TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl WHERE 1 = 1 AND tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID = #DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID# /* 공사상세정보.세부_공사_ID */ AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y'

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.selectCntrwkDtlNmListByCntrwkID */ /* 상세정보 이름 목록 조회 */ SELECT tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID , tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_NM FROM TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl WHERE tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ID = #CNTRWK_ID# AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N'

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.selectCntrwkDtlListByCntrwkID */ /* 상세정보목록 조회 */ SELECT COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE,'-') AS ROUTE_CODE , COALESCE(tnrouteinfo.ROAD_NAME,tncntrwkdtl.ROAD_NM) AS ROAD_NM , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.DIRECT_CODE,'-') AS DIRECT_CODE , COALESCE(tncntrwkdtl.TRACK,'-') AS TRACK , COALESCE( CASE WHEN tncntrwkdtl.DIRECT_CODE = 'S' THEN tnrouteinfo.ST_POINT WHEN tncntrwkdtl.DIRECT_CODE = 'E' THEN tnrouteinfo.ED_POINT END ,'-') AS DIRECT_POINT_NM , tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE , tncntrwkdtl.STRTPT , tncntrwkdtl.ENDPT FROM TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl INNER JOIN TN_ROUTE_INFO tnrouteinfo ON tnrouteinfo.ROAD_NO = tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE WHERE tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ID = #CNTRWK_ID# AND tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID = #DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID#
AND tncntrwkdtl.DIRECT_CODE = #DIRECT_CODE#
AND tncntrwkdtl.TRACK = #TRACK#
AND tncntrwkdtl.DIRECT_CODE = #DIRECT_CODE#
AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY ROAD_NAME, DIRECT_POINT_NM, TRACK

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.selectCntrwkStatsResult */ /* 포장공사노선별통계정보 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT, ROUTE_CODE, ROUTE_NM, COALESCE(SUM(CNTRWK_AMOUNT),0) AS CNTRWK_AMOUNT, COALESCE(SUM(TRACK_LEN),0) AS TRACK_LEN, ROUND(100 * (COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*) ) OVER() ),2) AS PERC FROM ( SELECT tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID, tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID, tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_AMOUNT, tncntrwkdtl.TRACK_LEN, tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE, FNC_GET_ROUTMYEONG(tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE) AS ROUTE_NM , tncntrwkdtl.PAV_STLE_CODE, tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE, tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE FROM TN_CNTRWK tncntrwk INNER JOIN TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl ON tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID = tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ID AND tncntrwk.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwk.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE 1=1
tncntrwk.DEPT_CODE = #SCH_DEPT_CODE# tncntrwk.STRWRK_DE >= #SCH_STRWRK_DE# tncntrwk.COMPET_DE <= #SCH_COMPET_DE# ) AS SUB_CNTRWK GROUP BY ROUTE_CODE,ROUTE_NM

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.selectCntrwkMthdStatsResult */ /* 포장공사공법별통계정보 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID) AS CNT, RPAIR_MTHD_NM, COALESCE(SUM(CNTRWK_AMOUNT),0) AS CNTRWK_AMOUNT, COALESCE(SUM(TRACK_LEN),0) AS TRACK_LEN, ROUND(100 * (COUNT(DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID) / SUM(COUNT(DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID) ) OVER() ),2) AS PERC FROM ( SELECT tcrpairmthd.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE, tccode.CODE_NM AS RPAIR_MTHD_NM, tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID, tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_AMOUNT, tncntrwkdtl.TRACK_LEN, tnrouteinfo.ROAD_NAME AS ROUTE_NM, tncntrwkdtl.PAV_STLE_CODE, tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE, tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE FROM TC_RPAIR_MTHD tcrpairmthd INNER JOIN TC_CODE tccode ON tccode.CODE_VAL = tcrpairmthd.MSRC_CL_CODE AND tccode.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tccode.DELETE_AT = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl ON tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE=tcrpairmthd.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_CNTRWK tncntrwk ON tncntrwkdtl.cntrwk_id = tncntrwk.cntrwk_id AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_ROUTE_INFO tnrouteinfo ON tnrouteinfo.ROAD_NO = tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND tcrpairmthd.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tcrpairmthd.DELETE_AT = 'N'
tcrpairmthd.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE = #SCH_RPAIR_MTHD# tncntrwk.STRWRK_DE >= #SCH_STRWRK_DE# tncntrwk.COMPET_DE <= #SCH_COMPET_DE# )as sub_CntrwkMthd GROUP BY RPAIR_MTHD_NM ORDER BY RPAIR_MTHD_NM

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.selectCntrwkDeptStatsResult */ /* 포장공사관리기관별통계정보 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT, DEPT_NM, COALESCE(SUM(CNTRWK_AMOUNT),0) AS CNTRWK_AMOUNT, COALESCE(SUM(TRACK_LEN),0) AS TRACK_LEN, ROUND(100 * (COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*) ) OVER() ),2) AS PERC FROM ( SELECT tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID,/*공사정보.공사ID*/ tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID,/*공사상세정보.세부공사ID*/ tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_AMOUNT,/*공사상세정보.공사금액*/ tncntrwkdtl.TRACK_LEN,/*공사상세정보.연장*/ FNC_GET_ROUTMYEONG(tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE) AS ROUTE_NM ,/*공사상세정보.노선코드*/ tcdept.LOWEST_DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM/*부서코드.최하위부서명*/ FROM TC_DEPT tcdept INNER JOIN TN_CNTRWK tncntrwk ON tcdept.DEPT_CODE = tncntrwk.DEPT_CODE AND tncntrwk.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwk.DELETE_AT = 'N' INNER JOIN TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl ON tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID = tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ID AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND tcdept.DEPT_CODE IN ('6411399','6411799')/*관리기관 : 남부(6411399),북부(6411799)*/ AND tcdept.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tcdept.DELETE_AT = 'N'
tncntrwk.DEPT_CODE = #SCH_DEPT_CODE# tncntrwk.STRWRK_DE >= #SCH_STRWRK_DE# tncntrwk.COMPET_DE <= #SCH_COMPET_DE# ) AS SUB_CNTRWK GROUP BY DEPT_NM

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.cntrwkRoutCntStatsExcel */ /* 포장공사노선별통계정보 엑셀조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT ,LTRIM(ROUTE_CODE,'0') AS ROUTE_CODE /*노선코드*/ ,ROUTE_NM /*노선명*/ ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(CAST(ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(CNTRWK_AMOUNT),0),0) AS TEXT)), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS CNTRWK_AMOUNT /*공사비*/ ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(CAST(ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(TRACK_LEN),0),0) AS TEXT)), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS TRACK_LEN /*연장*/ ,ROUND(100 * (COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*) ) OVER() ),2) AS PERC /*빈도수*/ FROM ( SELECT tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID /*공사정보.공사ID*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID /*공사세부정보.세부공사ID*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_AMOUNT /*공사세부정보.공사금액*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.TRACK_LEN /*공사세부정보.연장*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE /*공사세부정보.노선코드*/ ,FNC_GET_ROUTMYEONG(tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE) AS ROUTE_NM /*공사세부정보.노선명*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.PAV_STLE_CODE /*공사세부정보.세부공사ID*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE /*공사세부정보.보수공법코드*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE /*공사세부정보.포장재료표층코드*/ FROM TN_CNTRWK tncntrwk INNER JOIN TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl ON tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID = tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ID AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' /*공사세부정보.사용여부*/ AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND tncntrwk.USE_AT = 'Y' /*공사정보.사용여부*/ AND tncntrwk.DELETE_AT = 'N'
tncntrwk.DEPT_CODE = #SCH_DEPT_CODE# tncntrwk.STRWRK_DE >= #SCH_STRWRK_DE# tncntrwk.COMPET_DE <= #SCH_COMPET_DE# ) AS SUB_CNTRWK GROUP BY ROUTE_CODE,ROUTE_NM

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.cntrwkDeptCntStatsExcel */ /* 포장공사관리기관별통계정보 엑셀조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT ,DEPT_NM/*관리기관명*/ ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(CAST(ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(CNTRWK_AMOUNT),0),0) AS TEXT)), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS CNTRWK_AMOUNT /*공사비*/ ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(CAST(ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(TRACK_LEN),0),0) AS TEXT)), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS TRACK_LEN /*연장*/ ,ROUND(100 * (COUNT(*) / SUM(COUNT(*) ) OVER() ),2) AS PERC /*빈도수*/ FROM ( SELECT tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID/*공사정보.공사ID*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID/*공사상세정보.세부공사ID*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_AMOUNT/*공사상세정보.공사금액*/ ,tncntrwkdtl.TRACK_LEN/*공사상세정보.연장*/ ,FNC_GET_ROUTMYEONG(tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE) AS ROUTE_NM/*공사상세정보.노선코드*/ ,tcdept.LOWEST_DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM/*부서코드.최하위부서명*/ FROM TC_DEPT tcdept INNER JOIN TN_CNTRWK tncntrwk ON tcdept.DEPT_CODE = tncntrwk.DEPT_CODE AND tncntrwk.USE_AT = 'Y' /*공사정보.사용여부*/ AND tncntrwk.DELETE_AT = 'N' INNER JOIN TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl ON tncntrwk.CNTRWK_ID = tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_ID AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' /*공사세부정보.사용여부*/ AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND tcdept.DEPT_CODE IN ('6411399','6411799')/*관리기관 : 남부(6411399),북부(6411799)*/ AND tcdept.USE_AT = 'Y' /*부서정보.사용여부*/ AND tcdept.DELETE_AT = 'N'
tncntrwk.DEPT_CODE = #SCH_DEPT_CODE# tncntrwk.STRWRK_DE >= #SCH_STRWRK_DE# tncntrwk.COMPET_DE <= #SCH_COMPET_DE# ) AS SUB_CNTRWK GROUP BY DEPT_NM

/* cntrwkDtlDAO.cntrwkMthdCntStatsExcel */ /* 포장공사공법별통계정보 엑셀조회 */ SELECT COUNT(DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID) AS CNT ,RPAIR_MTHD_NM/*공법명*/ ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(CNTRWK_AMOUNT),0),0)::text), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS CNTRWK_AMOUNT/*공사비*/ ,REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE( REVERSE(ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(TRACK_LEN),0),0)::text), '([0-9]{3})','\1,')), '^,','') AS TRACK_LEN/*연장*/ ,ROUND(100 * (COUNT(DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID) / SUM(COUNT(DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID) ) OVER() ),2) AS PERC/*빈도*/ FROM ( SELECT tccode.CODE_NM AS RPAIR_MTHD_NM, tncntrwkdtl.DETAIL_CNTRWK_ID, tncntrwkdtl.CNTRWK_AMOUNT, tncntrwkdtl.TRACK_LEN, tnrouteinfo.ROAD_NAME AS ROUTE_NM, tncntrwkdtl.PAV_STLE_CODE, tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE, tncntrwkdtl.PAV_MATRL_ASCON_CODE FROM TC_RPAIR_MTHD tcrpairmthd INNER JOIN TC_CODE tccode ON tccode.CODE_VAL = tcrpairmthd.MSRC_CL_CODE AND tccode.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tccode.DELETE_AT = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_CNTRWK_DTL tncntrwkdtl ON tncntrwkdtl.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE=tcrpairmthd.RPAIR_MTHD_CODE AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_CNTRWK tncntrwk ON tncntrwkdtl.cntrwk_id = tncntrwk.cntrwk_id AND tncntrwkdtl.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tncntrwkdtl.DELETE_AT = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TN_ROUTE_INFO tnrouteinfo ON tnrouteinfo.ROAD_NO = tncntrwkdtl.ROUTE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND tcrpairmthd.USE_AT = 'Y' AND tcrpairmthd.DELETE_AT = 'N'
tncntrwk.DEPT_CODE = #SCH_DEPT_CODE# tncntrwk.STRWRK_DE >= #SCH_STRWRK_DE# tncntrwk.COMPET_DE <= #SCH_COMPET_DE# )as sub_cntrwkMthd GROUP BY RPAIR_MTHD_NM ORDER BY RPAIR_MTHD_NM
